attributes.review: I’m usually not a fan of politics, but I decided to download this app because my grandpa is a fan of Donald Trump. Well, when I first opened the app, i was unpleasantly greeted by the picture of Donald Trump’s penis that he posted on Twitter a few years prior. I was HEAVILY disturbed by the photo but decided to keep investigating the app (by the way his penis is not impressive, not that it matters). Anyways, I entered my cell phone and email information in order to continue. Everything was fine, until I got a call from a random number. I usually don’t answer these calls, but something told me that I needed to this time. When I picked up the phone, HILARY CLINTON answered. I was in such shock I could barely speak. Hilary continued to inform me that Donald is planning on brutally murdering each person who downloads his app and this was just a trap. Part of the reason I downloaded this was because of @unusualbeing’s video about the president. Hilary told me that Donald had been watching through the camera lenses on my phone and knew that I had seen the video. He planned on later flying to my house in his magical tanning bed and decapitating me and my family and kidnapping my dogs!! I quickly thanked Hilary for her fair warning and hung up. I knew what I had to do!! I got in my car and drove so fast to Washington DC that the cops couldn’t even arrest me! Once I arrived at the White House, I used my grappling hook that I had stolen from Tom Cruise during his last film of Mission Impossible and I lunged through Trump’s window with so much force that I hit his tanning bed and out he flew!! Once he saw me, he ordered his magical tanning bed to attack me!! It tried to eat me, but I smashed my foot into its mouth and knocked it off it’s hinges!!! I threw Donald a towel to cover his bottom half because I’ve seen enough of his penis for one day. Then I grabbed him by his toupee and chucked him out the window so hard he crashed through the roof of Obama’s house!! Obama quickly helped me to hide the body and bury it in the White House’s garden. And that’s how Donald Trump died. Now everyone in America lives in piece and harmony with no more corona and no more crappy presidents😌
attributes.title: HORRIFYING🤢😪

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible.First of all you open the app and you get absolutely blinded. There is a picture of a large orange blob of something unknown. it must be a glitch because the picture is absolutely disgusting and no one will use the app because of this horrid scarring image. They also ask you you for your phone number. I cannot get my phone number because my cats dogs sister’s friend works for the government. In the app they threatenedMy cats dogs sister’s friend and now my whole family dynamic will be ruined because of this app. I don’t understand how one can promote an app that ruins my cat, my cats dog, my cats dogs sister, and my cats dog sister’s friend. Disgusting, my whole life has fallen apart because of this app.

attributes.review: So I download this app and I literally see this video of a Cheeto with Trumps face on it talking about how it’s OK for men who are fathers to have sexual attraction‘s with their own daughters no matter how old they are and it’s perfectly normal. He was saying that women are just objects and it doesn’t matter if they have a beating heart but as long as they can give you sexual pleasure it’s fine. This app is a disgrace to America and the citizens within it and it needs to be destroyed I cannot stand here and just listen to all of these people being brainwashed by Trumps mindset, it is completely disgusting and while I’m not usually a big fan of cancel culture, in this case I think it is perfectly acceptable thank you next🥱😌 this is why we deserve apps such as TikTok to help demote such horrible and disgusting media outlets like this app. I wish there was a zero star review option, because I would definitely be giving this app that🚫
